title: Private Entrance, BBQ & Picnic Area, Late Fee Forgiveness
posting_body: ['Huntington House’s plush, landscaped courtyards with two community pools, walking paths, sundecks, barbecues and picnic tables welcomes residents with the perfect environment to call “home”.', 'Each apartment offers spacious floor plans, beautiful views of the courtyards and private entry.', 'Located on Fort Street enjoy Huntington House’s neighborhood charm in the city.', 'We would love for you to come on by and see what Huntington House has to offer!', '-No Security Deposit Required', '-Private Entrance', '-Upgraded Units Available', '-One $35 Application Fee Per Apartment, Not Per Person', '-Radiant Baseboard Heat', '-Late Fee Forgiveness', '-BBQ & Picnic Area', '-Online Payment Options (Credit Card, Debit Card and ACH)', '-Sparkling Clean Swimming Pool', '-Laundry Facility', '-Package Acceptance', '-Additional Storage', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability is subject to change.']
